profileAlternative.name: Doron Greenspan
profileAlternative.headline: Account Executive - NY Metro Enterprise Accounts at MongoDB
profileAlternative.summary:
MongoDB unleashes the power of software and data for innovators everywhere -

By offering the best of traditional databases as well as the flexibility, scale, and performance required by today’s applications, MongoDB lets innovators deploy apps as big as they can possibly dream. From startups to enterprises, for the modern and the mission-critical, MongoDB is the database for giant ideas.

Contact me to find out what resources MongoDB Inc. has to help your business use our database as performant, secure, and efficient as possible.

positions.title: MongoDB
positions.description:
Responsible for driving enterprise licensing, commercial support, training, and consulting revenue for MongoDB.

MongoDB, Inc. is the company behind MongoDB. We build MongoDB and the drivers, and sell software and services to make your life easier. We also run MongoDB University and sponsor the community, hosting MongoDB World and MongoDB Days all over the globe. With offices across North America, Europe, and Asia, we are close to where you do business.
…

positions.title: Co-Founder
positions.description:
Are you a sales development, business development, or inside sales rep? Is your job all about prospecting? Come join our community of sales professionals to learn all about the in's and out's of sales development, how to improve your sales skills, and build connections with other sales peers and leaders.

This group was launched with support from the Enterprise Sales Meetup to focus on the needs of teams focused on prospecting and share best practices in the evolving field of Sales Development.

http://www.meetup.com/Sales-Development-Meetup/

positions.title: Account Executive
positions.description:
Signed the largest account in New York office (Shutterstock)

Drove office to profitability while working cross functionally with account management, vendor
management and operations

Vastly increased account base by signing marquee clients such as Shutterstock, Yipit, Oscar,
Sailthru, One Kings Lane, Indeed, MongoDB, Gawker Media and BDO among many others

Owned complete sales cycle from prospecting, qualifying, pitching, contract negotiation, closing and
retention with a strong focus on reducing churn

Created and designed sales deck and sales support materials adopted by entire sales team

Managed and tracked leads in the lead database through Salesforce

We specialize in positions related to digital/new media. An in-depth understanding of both the interactive landscape and the recruiting process enables us to propel the success of the interactive media industry's hottest and fastest growing companies

positions.description: Present the campus to applicants and their parents. Highlight the strengths of our college and developed new and improved methods of giving the tour that were adopted throughout the division.

positions.title: Sales Representative
positions.description: I sold a membership plan to merchants to improve their marketing edge. This involved generating my own leads, following up with the leads and closing sales.

positions.title: Intern
positions.description: I was responsible for making sure the showroom was presentable for sales personnel. I also spent time in the Finance department analyzing cost accounts.

given.text:
Doron rocks. If you don't have time to read a long recommendation, those are the only two words you need. Doron came on board as an SDR, and while the world around him was shifting and changing, he kept his priorities and his goals straight – at one point carrying the whole SDR Lead quota by himself – and he was of course quickly tapped to build a new team and turn up the heat. He built and led a high-output, high-touch team that has kept the leads coming, to the delight of everyone who sits later in the funnel. All while doing this, Doron always has a positive attitude, a curious mind, and follows up on every promise he makes. And he always does it with a smile, willing to help everyone through the toughest of days. In other words, I'd happily recommend Doron – he rocks! But I told you that already, didn't I?
…
See more

received.text: I had the pleasure of working with Kevin for 2 years at Smartling and considered him a mentor figure. Over that time period, I witnessed Kevin get involved in every area of the business - there was no problem too small or too big - and immerse himself in understanding that unit's challenges. He rolled up his sleeves and got involved in fixing the immediate issues as well as implementing a strategic vision, only moving on when the job was done. Kevin was also focused on our personal development and gave generously of his time to discuss our career paths, our business ideas, and feedback in general. Kevin was instrumental in my growth as an employee and as a person and I can't recommend him highly enough.

Michael and I have worked on several projects together, and I have always appreciated his talent, professionalism, diligence and teamwork skills. Michael was a key player in the development and execution of a results driven business development desk. The product that we sold was complex, and the messaging difficult to nail down, but Michael's ability to take complex ideas and communicate them in easy to understand and succinct messaging, helped us achieve and surpass our lead generation goals. 

Furthermore, he is an absolute pleasure to be around, and a natural leader. He inspired a team to overcome obstacles and exceed the business's expectations. I highly recommend him to any company.

peopleAlsoViewed.text: President & CEO @ MongoDB. We are hiring everywhere.
